    Textures[
		Texture[name1, path1]
		Texture[name2, path2]
    ]

    SpriteSheets[
		SpriteSheet[
            SpriteSize[10, 5, 69]
            Texture[name1, path1]
            Animations[
                Animation[
                    AnimationName[hranaMontana]
                    KeyFrames[
                        KeyFrame[5, 11.5]

                        KeyFrame[158, 111.5]
                    ]
                ]
            ]
            FrameDescriptions[
                FrameDescription[ana]
                FrameDescription[are]
                FrameDescription[mere]
            ]
        ]

        SpriteSheet[
            SpriteSize[10, 5, 69]
            Texture[name1, path1]
            Animations[

                    KeyFrames[

                    ]
                ]
            ]
